item.title: 哥伦比亚可卡因潜在产量飙升至历史新高
item.description: 随着古斯塔沃-彼得罗总统的政府改变了打击非法毒品的策略，哥伦比亚的可卡因产量再次创下新高。【原文：Colombia has once again produced cocaine at a record pace as President Gustavo Petro’s government changed the country’s strategy for fighting illegal drugs.】

item.title: 加密货币公司首席执行官被拒新加坡 PR 申请，正酝酿搬迁
item.description: 本周，南森私人有限公司（Nansen Pte）首席执行官亚历克斯-斯万尼维克（Alex Svanevik）透露，他在新加坡的永久居留申请被拒，新加坡推动数字资产中心建设的努力再次成为焦点。【原文：Singapore’s push to foster a digital-asset hub jumped back into the spotlight this week when Nansen Pte Chief Executive Officer Alex Svanevik revealed his application for permanent residence there had been rejected.】

item.title: 惠誉上调意大利债务展望至正面
item.description: 惠誉评级公司（Fitch Ratings）上调了意大利的信用评级展望，这是意大利总理乔治亚-梅洛尼（Giorgia Meloni）的意外之喜。【原文：The outlook on Italy’s credit status was raised by Fitch Ratings, an unexpected win for Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni.】

item.title: 巴西淡水河谷-必和必拓矿难交易接近达成和解
item.description: 矿商淡水河谷公司（Vale SA）和必和必拓集团（BHP Group）距离与巴西当局敲定一项协议又近了一步，该协议将为巴西最严重的矿难之一提供数十亿美元的赔偿。【原文：Miners Vale SA and BHP Group are a step closer to finalizing a deal with Brazilian authorities to provide a multibillion dollar settlement for one of the country’s worst mining disasters.】

item.title: 美国议员敦促日本加强对华芯片限制
item.description: 美国主要立法者敦促日本加强对向中国销售芯片制造设备的限制，并警告说如果东京不采取行动，华盛顿可能会对日本公司实施自己的限制措施，或禁止向中国销售的工具制造商获得美国的半导体补贴。【原文：Key US lawmakers urged Japan to strengthen restrictions on sales of chipmaking equipment to China, warning that if Tokyo fails to act, Washington could impose its own curbs on Japanese companies or bar toolmakers that sell to China from receiving US semiconductor subsidies.】

item.title: 可可价格帮助象牙海岸赢得 S&P 信用升级
item.description: 可可价格的上涨和出口的增加帮助象牙海岸赢得了S&P全球评级公司的信用评级升级，使这个西非国家的投资等级更近了一步。【原文：Higher prices for cocoa and rising exports helped Ivory Coast win a credit rating upgrade from S&P Global Ratings, which boosted the Western African nation a notch closer to investment grade.】

item.title: LSEG 因员工跟踪黑人青少年的视频而将其开除
item.description: 伦敦证券交易所集团公司（London Stock Exchange Group Plc）在调查了一段 "令人担忧的视频 "后解雇了一名员工，该视频显示他跟踪一名黑人少年在他母亲所说的佛罗里达州附近转悠。【原文：London Stock Exchange Group Plc terminated an employee after it investigated a “concerning video” of him following a Black teen around what his mother said was his Florida neighborhood.】

item.title: 范围降级，法国再遭债务警告
item.description: 法国评级公司 Scope Ratings 下调了法国的评级，再次对该国的财政状况以及遏制预算赤字膨胀的政治障碍发出警告。【原文：France was downgraded by Scope Ratings in another warning on the state of the country’s finances and the political impediments to containing a ballooning budget deficit.】

item.title: 华尔街不停歇的反弹造就了一批新的铁杆牛人
item.description: 华尔街的怀疑论者们认为好景不长，其实有很多证据可以佐证。股票估值捉襟见肘，公司债券利差收窄，黄金创下历史新高。【原文：For Wall Street skeptics arguing the good times can’t last, there is plenty of supporting evidence. Equity valuations are stretched, corporate bond spreads are tightening and gold is at a record.】

item.title: 去年谈判结束后，Cigna 恢复与 Humana 的合并谈判
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，在去年年底合并谈判破裂后，Cigna 集团重启了与规模较小的竞争对手 Humana Inc.【原文：Cigna Group has revived efforts to combine with its smaller rival Humana Inc. after merger talks fell apart late last year, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 对冲基金将 WTI 原油看涨押注降至八个月低点
item.description: 由于对以色列将打击伊朗石油基础设施的预期减弱，对冲基金将看涨西德克萨斯中质原油价格的押注降至八个月来的最低点。【原文：Hedge funds slashed their bullish bets on West Texas Intermediate crude prices to the lowest in eight months as expectations ebbed that Israel will strike Iran’s oil infrastructure.】

item.title: Anthropic 首席执行官认为，到 2026 年，人工智能可能会超越大多数人类
item.description:
达里奥-阿莫迪想象了一个世界，在这个世界中，更强大的人工智能将解决社会的一些最大问题。【原文：

Dario Amodei imagines a world where more powerful AI solves some of society’s biggest problems. 

】

item.title: 花旗银行聘请 BBVA 技术主管领导 Banamex 首次公开募股前的改革工作
item.description: 在墨西哥消费银行计划于明年首次公开募股之前，花旗集团挖来了毕尔巴鄂维斯卡亚阿根廷银行（Banco Bilbao Vizcaya Argentaria SA）的软件开发主管，负责领导其 Banamex 部门的技术架构改革。【原文：Citigroup Inc. poached Banco Bilbao Vizcaya Argentaria SA’s head of software development to lead a technology architecture overhaul at its Banamex unit ahead of the Mexican consumer bank’s planned initial public offering next year.】

item.title: 汽车供应商德纳探索出售非公路业务部门
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，德纳公司正在探索出售其非公路业务，因为这家汽车供应商正在应对其主要市场的低迷需求。【原文：Dana Inc. is exploring a sale of its off-highway business, people familiar with the matter said, as the automotive supplier responds to sluggish demand in its key markets.】

item.title: Google Play 法官暂时叫停应用程序商店变更令
item.description: Alphabet Inc. 旗下的谷歌公司不必立即修改其 Google Play 商店政策，因为加利福尼亚州的一名联邦法官暂时搁置了他的命令，该命令本会迫使这家科技巨头彻底改革其应用程序市场。【原文：Alphabet Inc.’s Google won’t have to immediately revamp its Google Play store policies, after a federal judge in California temporarily paused his order that would have forced the technology giant to overhaul its app marketplace.】

item.title: 梅布-法贝尔谈为什么谨慎的投资者总是受到惩罚
item.description:
多样化的熊市。【原文：

The bear market in diversification.

】

item.title: 赤道公司聘请 Safra 为其风电资产出售提供咨询服务
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，巴西能源分销商 Equatorial Energia SA 正与 Banco J. Safra 合作，为其出售风电资产提供咨询。【原文：Equatorial Energia SA, a Brazilian energy distributor, is working with Banco J. Safra to advise on a sale of wind power assets, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国银行称，回购敏感性暗示现金可能并不充裕
item.description: 据美国银行（Bank of America Corp）称，近期融资市场利率升高，加之银行贷款不足，加剧了人们对金融系统缺乏充裕现金的担忧。【原文：Recent elevated rates in funding markets, combined with a lack of bank lending, are fueling concern over lack of plentiful cash in the financial system, according to Bank of America Corp.】

item.title: Cinctive 副首席信息官 Haddad 和宏观主管 Coppel 离开对冲基金
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Cinctive Capital Management 的副首席投资官、宏观部主管及其宏观策略师已经离开了这家成立 5 年的多经理人对冲基金。【原文：Cinctive Capital Management’s deputy chief investment officer, head of macro and its macro strategist have left the 5-year-old multimanager hedge fund, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 小盘股 ETF 如今持有的小盘股并不多
item.description:
在这个由巨型企业和仍然高企的利率所主导的时代，与大型企业相比，这个市场中的小公司在过去几年中的表现可谓惨不忍睹。【原文：

In an era dominated by megacaps and still-high interest rates, the little guys of this market have performed miserably against their larger peers over the past several years.

】

item.title: Citadel 聘请苹果公司顶级招聘主管担任新人事主管
item.description: 据知情人士透露，苹果公司的招聘高管即将离职，前往投资公司 Citadel 担任首席人事官，这标志着这家 iPhone 制造商动荡的人力资源团队又一次重大离职。【原文：Apple Inc.’s top recruiting executive is leaving to become the chief people officer at investment firm Citadel, according to people with knowledge of the matter, marking another major departure for the iPhone maker’s tumultuous human resources team.】

item.title: 阿尔特曼支持的核电股票因人工智能电力需求而身价倍增
item.description: 本周，由于投资者纷纷涌入与电力行业相关的公司，一家由山姆-奥特曼（Sam Altman）支持的先进核能系统开发商的价值翻了一番多。【原文：A developer of advanced nuclear systems backed by Sam Altman has more than doubled in value this week as investors rushed to pile into companies associated with the power industry.】

item.title: 赛诺菲将于本周末与 CD&R 公司签署消费者保健协议
item.description: 据知情人士透露，赛诺菲将于本周末签署一项协议，将其消费者保健业务的控制权出售给 Clayton Dubilier & Rice 公司，在此之前，竞争对手曾试图破坏这一交易。【原文：Sanofi is aiming to sign an agreement this weekend to sell control of its consumer health business to Clayton Dubilier & Rice, following a last-ditch attempt by a rival bidder to derail the deal, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 美国最繁忙的贸易枢纽第三季度货物吞吐量打破大流行病记录
item.description: 美国最繁忙的集装箱集散地继续保持着接近创纪录的进口量，因为企业要在潜在的关税上调之前将货物运入，并避免在其他港口受到飓风和劳动力的干扰。【原文：The busiest container complex in the US continues to churn through near-record import volumes as businesses bring goods in ahead of potential tariff increases and avoid hurricane and labor disruptions at alternate ports.】

item.title: 随着 Ken Leech 调查的深入，司法部对 Wamco 客户进行了询问
item.description: 随着美国当局加大对曾经的明星交易员肯-利奇（Ken Leech）如何分配获胜赌注的调查力度，使用西方资产管理公司（Western Asset Management Co.【原文：Money managers that used Western Asset Management Co. to help invest their bond portfolios are being pressed about their dealings with the firm, as US authorities ramp up their investigation of how once-star trader Ken Leech allocated winning bets.】

item.title: 古巴因发电厂故障和燃料短缺而大面积停电
item.description: 古巴的主要发电厂发生故障后，整个古巴都停电了，政府为了节省燃料，对主要行业进行了控制。【原文：Electricity went out across the entirety of Cuba after the island’s main power plant failed and the government throttled key industries in an effort to save fuel.】

item.title: 加拿大原油输往阿拉斯加，新输油管道改变出口格局
item.description: 由于最近扩建的跨山管道开辟了新的出口机会，一油轮加拿大原油至少十年来首次从温哥华运往阿拉斯加。【原文：A tanker of Canadian crude was shipped from Vancouver to Alaska for the first time in at least 10 years as the recently expanded Trans Mountain pipeline opens up new export opportunities.】

item.title: 拜州美国公司在法院托管下进行破产出售
item.description: 法院指定的受托人表示，破产的印度科技公司 Byju's 几年前以 8.2 亿美元收购的三家美国教育软件公司将被出售，以偿还贷款人的债务。【原文：Three US education-software companies that bankrupt Indian tech-firm Byju’s bought for $820 million just a few years ago will be put up for sale in order to repay lenders, a court-appointed trustee said.】

item.title: 对于想要重新抵押贷款的人来说，时机不对
item.description: 大家好，欢迎阅读《奇点》时事通讯，它是来自《奇点》世界的每日内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 比特币在创下新高后重新向 70,000 美元挺进
item.description: 比特币在五天内第四次攀升，投机者在数字资产日益繁荣的背景下，再次瞄准了 7 万美元的目标。【原文：Bitcoin climbed for the fourth time in five days, with speculators targeting $70,000 once again amid growing exuberance for digital assets.】
